Text.Name: SuperPart_Gong_2_1
Text.Desc: A basic secret body famous for its wild attack. Its unique skill to wield power can to some extent penetrate Qi barriers.
Text.Levels.0.Title: First Layer
Text.Levels.0.Desc: Slightly increases the secret body attack performance.
Text.Levels.1.Title: Second Layer
Text.Levels.1.Desc: Moderately increases the secret body attack accuracy.
Text.Levels.2.Title: Third Layer
Text.Levels.2.Desc: Fundamentally increases the secret body power by a small amount.
Text.Levels.3.Title: Fourth Layer
Text.Levels.3.Desc: Moderately increases the secret body Qi barrier penetration.
Text.Levels.4.Title: Fifth Layer
Text.Levels.4.Desc: Fundamentally increases the secret body power by a moderate amount.

Text.Name: SuperPart_Gong_2_1_1
Text.Desc: A basic secret body famous for its wild attack. Its unique skill to wield power can to some extent penetrate Qi barriers.
Text.Levels.0.Title: First Layer
Text.Levels.0.Desc: Slightly increases the secret body attack performance.
Text.Levels.1.Title: Second Layer
Text.Levels.1.Desc: Moderately increases the secret body attack accuracy.
Text.Levels.2.Title: Third Layer
Text.Levels.2.Desc: Fundamentally increases the secret body power by a small amount.
Text.Levels.3.Title: Fourth Layer
Text.Levels.3.Desc: Moderately increases the secret body Qi barrier penetration.
Text.Levels.4.Title: Fifth Layer
Text.Levels.4.Desc: Fundamentally increases the secret body power by a moderate amount.

Text.Name: SuperPart_Gong_2_2
Text.Desc: Remolds the hands with demon energy to give them unthinkable power. This technique excels at penetrating defense and barriers, and it can even cross the two realms.
Text.Levels.0.Title: First Layer
Text.Levels.0.Desc: Slightly increases the secret body Qi barrier penetration.
Text.Levels.1.Title: Second Layer
Text.Levels.1.Desc: Moderately increases the secret body Qi barrier penetration.
Text.Levels.2.Title: Third Layer
Text.Levels.2.Desc: Drastically increases the secret body Qi barrier penetration.

Text.Name: SuperPart_Gong_2_2_1
Text.Desc: Remolds the hands with demon energy to give them unthinkable power. This technique excels at penetrating defense and barriers, and it can even cross the two realms.
Text.Levels.0.Title: First Layer
Text.Levels.0.Desc: Slightly increases the secret body Qi barrier penetration.
Text.Levels.1.Title: Second Layer
Text.Levels.1.Desc: Moderately increases the secret body Qi barrier penetration.
Text.Levels.2.Title: Third Layer
Text.Levels.2.Desc: Drastically increases the secret body Qi barrier penetration.

Text.Name: SuperPart_Gong_2_3
Text.Desc: Draws energy from the earth with both feet and uses the body as bridge to connect all the way to the top of the head. Very destructive once achieved.
Text.Levels.0.Title: First Layer
Text.Levels.0.Desc: Fundamentally increases the secret body power by a small amount.
Text.Levels.1.Title: Second Layer
Text.Levels.1.Desc: Fundamentally increases the secret body power by a moderate amount.
Text.Levels.2.Title: Third Layer
Text.Levels.2.Desc: Fundamentally increases the secret body power by a large amount.

Text.Name: SuperPart_Gong_2_4
Text.Desc: An entry-level secret body popular among physical cultivators. Remolds the shinbones with secret techniques to make them extremely resistant to damage and quick to attack and defend.
Text.Levels.0.Title: First Layer
Text.Levels.0.Desc: Moderately increases the secret body performance.
Text.Levels.1.Title: Second Layer
Text.Levels.1.Desc: Moderately increases the secret body defense success rate.
Text.Levels.2.Title: Third Layer
Text.Levels.2.Desc: Fundamentally increases the secret body endurance by a moderate amount.
Text.Levels.3.Title: Fourth Layer
Text.Levels.3.Desc: Drastically increases the secret body defense success rate.

Text.Name: SuperPart_Gong_2_4_1
Text.Desc: An entry-level secret body popular among physical cultivators. Remolds the shinbones with secret techniques to make them extremely resistant to damage and quick to attack and defend.
Text.Levels.0.Title: First Layer
Text.Levels.0.Desc: Moderately increases the secret body performance.
Text.Levels.1.Title: Second Layer
Text.Levels.1.Desc: Moderately increases the secret body defense success rate.
Text.Levels.2.Title: Third Layer
Text.Levels.2.Desc: Fundamentally increases the secret body endurance by a moderate amount.
Text.Levels.3.Title: Fourth Layer
Text.Levels.3.Desc: Drastically increases the secret body defense success rate.

Text.Name: SuperPart_Gong_2_5
Text.Desc: Remolds the hand bones into materials that devour Qi and forms a circle around the body. Penetrates the protection Qi and also guard the body against attack.
Text.Levels.0.Title: First Layer
Text.Levels.0.Desc: Drastically increases the secret body Qi barrier penetration.
Text.Levels.1.Title: Second Layer
Text.Levels.1.Desc: Moderately reduces the elemental attack received by the secret body.
Text.Levels.2.Title: Third Layer
Text.Levels.2.Desc: Drastically increases the secret body Qi barrier penetration.\n Moderately reduces the elemental attack received by the secret body.

Text.Name: SuperPart_Gong_2_6
Text.Desc: Remolds the main bones in the body into a whole that shares damage equally. Practice it to the extreme to become nearly indestructible.
Text.Levels.0.Title: First Layer
Text.Levels.0.Desc: Fundamentally increases the secret body endurance by a small amount.
Text.Levels.1.Title: Second Layer
Text.Levels.1.Desc: Fundamentally increases the secret body endurance by a moderate amount.
Text.Levels.2.Title: Third Layer
Text.Levels.2.Desc: Fundamentally increases the secret body endurance by a large amount.
Text.Levels.3.Title: Fourth Layer
Text.Levels.3.Desc: Fundamentally increases the secret body endurance by a huge amount.

Text.Name: SuperPart_Gong_2_7
Text.Desc: Remolds the heart with techniques so that it produces Firestruck Blood. Using the blood for remolding can effectively increase the result. If this method is used to remold the spine, there is a low chance for it to mutate and develop potential for the evolution of all the bones.
Text.Levels.0.Title: First Layer

Text.Name: SuperPart_Gong_2_8
Text.Desc: Remolds the heart into its primal form to drastically increase True Qi recovery rate.
Text.Levels.0.Title: First Layer
Text.Levels.0.Desc: Slightly increases the secret body True Qi recovery rate.
Text.Levels.1.Title: Second Layer
Text.Levels.1.Desc: Moderately increases the secret body True Qi recovery rate.
Text.Levels.2.Title: Third Layer
Text.Levels.2.Desc: Drastically increases the secret body True Qi recovery rate.

Text.Name: SuperPart_Gong_2_9
Text.Desc: Remolds the brain that allows the physical cultivator to have Barbarian Will when focused to drastically increase attack ability.
Text.Levels.0.Title: First Layer

Text.Name: SuperPart_Gong_2_10
Text.Desc: Remolds the eyes with techniques and allows them to connect with the Eight Poles in order to anticipate the enemy's movement and drastically increase attack accuracy.
Text.Levels.0.Title: First Layer
Text.Levels.0.Desc: Increases the physical cultivator's attack accuracy by a huge amount.

Text.Name: SuperPart_Gong_2_11
Text.Desc: A secret body imitating the mouth of Taotie. Using this secret body can directly devour energy from heaven and earth for replenishment.
Text.Levels.0.Title: First Layer
